'''From Shadows'''是美国动画《[[RWBY]]》预告片的主题曲之一。


{{Infobox Song

|编曲=Jeff Williams

}}


== 简介 ==
[[RWBY]]预告片之B主题曲

== 歌曲 ==
<flashmp3>From Shadows.mp3</flashmp3>

== 歌词（Black Trailler） ==

from shadows we'll descend upon the world

take back what you stole

from shadows we'll reclaim our destiny

set our future free

and we'll rise

and we'll rise


above the darkness and the shame

above the torture and the pain

above the ridicule and hate

above the binding of our fate


born with no life....into subjugation

treated like a worthless animal

stripped of all rights

just a lesser being

crushed by cruel ruthless human rule


when it started

all we wanted was a chance to live our lives

now in darkness

taking everything we want and we will rise

we'll rise

we'll rise

== 歌词翻译（Black Trailler） ==
我们将从暗影中降临于世

夺回你窃取之物

我们将从暗影中改变宿命

则我们将崛起

则我们将崛起


超越黑暗与耻辱

超越折磨与痛苦

超越嘲笑与仇恨

超越命运的束缚

降生于无被征服

众人待我如刍狗

全部权利被剥夺

下贱生物莫过此

被冷酷无情的人世规则弄得崩溃


最初之时

我们想要的仅是个能让自己过活的机会

而今在黑暗中

夺走所有我们想要之物，则我们将崛起

我们将崛起

我们将崛起
